gameDetails.name: Ora et Labora: Loamy Landscape
gameDetails.description:
Ora et Labora: Loamy Landscape is a single building card that was given out as a promotional item during Spiel 2011. The Lookout Games edition was English on one side and German on the other, with the card needing to be cut out by the user; other editions have only a single language.

Ora et Labora: Loamy Landscape, which is used only in the French variant, allows a user to switch the position of any two tokens on the rondel, then take either sheep, wheat or clay and move the appropriate token to zero on the rondel.
